string-array.name: OtagoSteps_Array
string-array.item: Stand Up : Stand Up Tall and Look ahead : Head, Turn Head Right : Slowly turn your head as far as you can to the right : Head, Turn Head Left : Slowly turn your head as far as you can to the left, Repeat 5 Times : Repeat 5 Times to Each Side : Head
Stand Up : Stand Up Tall and Look ahead : Neck, Hand on Chin : Place on hand on chin : Neck, Move Head Back : Guide your head straight back : Neck, Repeat 5 Times : Repeat 5 Times : Neck
Stand Up : Stand up tall with feet shoulder width apart : Back, Hands on back : Place hands on the small : Back, Arch Back : Gently Arch Back : Back, Repeat 5 Times : Repeat 5 Times : Back
